attributes.action: Stop British airways holding the monopoly between London Heathrow and Scotland
attributes.additional_details:
British airways holds the UK economy to ransom being the only airline from Scotland's airports and London Heathrow 

London Heathrow is the hub airport for the UK.

The UK also has no competition for domestic flights into the UKs largest airport. 

we need a competitor on these routes to stop British Airways charging high prices with no other alternatives for consumers.
attributes.background: British airways are the only airline that flys to London Heathrow from Scotland and vice-versa, they hold a Monoply on landing slots at London Heathrow, BA are suppose to be a British Airline however all flights connect via LHR making them a London airline only! Not very British! We need competition
